short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bulletin board with a small todo list and image to be used as a homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BulletinBoard HomePage creates your own personal bulletin board in Chrome to keep track of important tasks and mark them off as you complete them. Also included is the ability to pin an image of your choice alongside your to-do list. Get organized and motivated with your own BulletinBoard HomePage.
